__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ [[Rationale::Relates a wiki article to term import run, in which the article was generated. This property is set by the system and should not be changed by users.]]
[[has type::Page | ]] [[Part of bundle::Dataimport| ]] [[Category:Property]]

__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ [[Rationale::Relates a wiki article to term import run, in which the article was generated. This property is set by the system and should not be changed by users.]]
[[has type::Page | ]] [[Part of bundle::Dataimport| ]] [[Category:Property]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the subject value of a feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::String| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the values of the category annotations of an imported feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::Page| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores from which feed definition in the Wiki this feed stems.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::Page| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the copyright information for this feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the permalink of this feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::URL| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the publication date of this feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]]
[[Has type::Date| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores who the contributor of a feed item was.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::Page| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the content of a feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]]
[[Has type::Text| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1|1]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the local publication date of this feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::Date| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the unique id of a feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::Text| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the value of the longitude annotation of a feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::String| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the value of the latitude annotation of a feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::Steing| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::Links to files that were embedded in an imported Feed Item. ]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::URL| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property links to the author of a feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]]
[[Has type::Page| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the original source of a feed item if it was republiched.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::Page| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]] [[aaaay::| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::This property stores the URL of a feed or a feed item.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::URL| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:Feed;| ]] [[Delimiter::;;| ]]

__NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__ [[Rationale::Instances in this category represent feed items that have been imported by the Feed Import Data Access Module. ]] [[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]] [[Use display template::FeedItem| ]]

__NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__ [[Rationale::Instances in this category describe feeds. The Feed Import Data Access Module will import all feeds, that are described by instances in thiss category.]] [[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]] [[Use display template::Feed| ]]

__NOEDITSECTION__ [[Rationale::This bundle contains properties and categories, that are used by the Data Import extension, e.g. for describing the results of a Term Import or for customizing an RSS Feed import.]]
;Vendor :[[Vendor::ontoprise GmbH|ontoprise GmbH]] ;Maintainer :[[Maintainer::ontoprise GmbH|ontoprise GmbH]] ;License :[[License::Ontoprise license for SMWplus|Ontoprise license for SMWplus]] ;Version :[[Ontology version::1.4.4|1.4.4]] ;Patch level :[[Patchlevel::0|0]] ;Installation directory :[[Installation dir::extensions/DataImport|extensions/DataImport]] ;Depends on the following extensions: : SMW<sub>+</sub> 1.6.0 [[Dependency::smwplus;1.6.0| ]] : Halo Extension 1.6.0 [[Dependency::smwhalo;1.6.0| ]] : Semantic Gardening 1.3.6 [[semanticgardening;1.3.6| ]]
;The dataimport bundle contains the following articles {{#ask:[[Part of bundle::dataimport]] |?=Link |?Category |?Rationale |link=subject |default=''none'' |mainlabel=- |source=Wiki |format=table |limit=500}} [[Part of bundle::Dataimport| ]] [[Category:Content bundle]]<nowiki>(c) Vulcan inc</nowiki>

__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ [[Rationale::Instances in this category define term imports.]]
[[Part of bundle::Dataimport| ]]

__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ [[Rationale::Instances in this category report the results of of a term import execution.]]
[[Part of bundle::Dataimport| ]]

__NOTOC__ [[Rationale::The value of this property will be used as prefix for titles of imported feed items.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Category:Property]] [[Has type::Text| ]][[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:FeedItem;| ]][[Has domain and range::Category:Feed;| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1|:1]]

<noinclude> __NOEDITSECTION__ __NORICHEDITOR__ [[Rationale::Display Template for instances in the category FeedItem.]] [[Category:Template]] [[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]] </noinclude><includeonly>{{#ask: [[{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | ?Has subject | ?Has URL | ?Has publication date | ?Has author | ?Has content | limit=1 | format=template | template=FeedItemDisplay | link=none }}</includeonly>

__NOEDITSECTION__ __NORICHEDITOR__ [[Rationale::Helper template for the Feed and the FeedItem display templates.]] [[Category:Template]] [[Part of bundle::dataimport| ]] ;[{{{2}}} {{{1}}}]
''{{{3|}}}{{#ifeq:{{{4r|}}}||| by [[{{{4|}}}]]}}'' {{{5|}}}
